lead_paragraph: Seattle Seahawks cornerback Richard Sherman ripped into the NFL on Thursday, questioning the league's officiating and saying the decline in television ratings is due in part to the league simply not being fun anymore.

headline.print_headline: Seahawks' Richard Sherman Takes Aim at NFL and Officials
headline.main: Seahawks' Richard Sherman Takes Aim at NFL and Officials

snippet: Seattle Seahawks cornerback Richard Sherman ripped into the NFL on Thursday, questioning the league's officiating and saying the decline in television ratings is due in part to the league simply not being fun anymore....
